p: Chemicals and reagents used are Gallic acid, Folin- Ciocalteu reagent, 2,2 diphenyl-2-picrylhydrazyl (DPPH), Trichloroacetic acid (TCA), Hydrogen peroxide, Methanol, FeCl 3, FeCl 2, Phosphate buffer, Ferrozine, Potassium ferricyanide, Î² carotene, linoleic acid, Tween 80, Chloroform of Sigma-Aldrich (USA) and Himedia Laboratories Pvt. Ltd. India. All solvents used were of analytical grade.
